metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1002100 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Kubernetes versions 1.5.x, 1.6.x, 1.7.x, 1.8.x, and prior to version 1.9.6, the kubectl cp command insecurely handles tar data returned from the container, and can be caused to overwrite arbitrary local files.

notes.Note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
